text:
I've automated my build process and at the end I'm sending a notification email 
with several jars attached using the fileset capability of the mail task.  (I 
haven't tried sending just a simple text message.)

The attachments add up to about 18MB.

I send the email to multiple recipients.  Some people get the message, some 
people get a malformatted email message.

I don't have JavaMail set up.  It tells me that it fails to send via MimeMail.  
It doesn't give me any other failure messages so I assume it is sending a 
message using its second strategy (uu encoding).
creator: jrussell@stanfordalumni.org
stevel@apache.org
text:
I am not convinced that without javamail you will get any sensible attachments
at all. Get the javamail stuff; see if it fixes things.

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
I tried to send 2.2MB with 391 attachements with JavaMail (mime) and without 
(UU) and did not have any problems.

Feel free to reopen if you can provide more information on the source of the 
problem. There is not enough right now to do anything.
